Uses of Class
tijos.framework.net.ntp.TimeInfo

  • Packages that use TimeInfo 
    Package Description
    tijos.framework.net.ntp
    Network time protocol client class

    • Uses of TimeInfo in tijos.framework.net.ntp

      Methods in tijos.framework.net.ntp that return TimeInfo 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TimeInfo NTPUDPClient.getTime(java.net.InetAddress host)
      Retrieves the time information from the specified server on the default NTP port and returns it.
      TimeInfo NTPUDPClient.getTime(java.net.InetAddress host, int port)
      Retrieves the time information from the specified server and port and returns it.
